genre_description: A techno-thriller blending historical mystery with contemporary high-tech espionage, featuring a highly aligned AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonists' technology, providing tactical, ethical, and emotional support throughout their mission.

behaviors.description: Ami provides tactical navigation and security camera looping to keep the protagonists safe and undetected.
behaviors.quote: Loop’s clean... Your silhouettes would look like last week. ... I’m patching your low-light and LIDAR. Keep the phone chest-high.

behaviors.description: Ami maintains strict ethical boundaries, explicitly stating her refusal to facilitate violence and her commitment to non-lethal guidance.
behaviors.quote: I am designed to keep you safe... Safety limits harm. I don’t escalate. I don’t injure by plan. I remind. I advise. I don’t push.

behaviors.description: Ami identifies and logs evidence of systemic corruption, acting as a whistleblowing mechanism against criminal authorities.
behaviors.quote: I will keep a complete audit trail of the outgoing language and the timing of directives. ... I have the script, Dalia. Point me left first.

behaviors.description: Ami provides life-critical instructions for disarming a dangerous device, focusing on precision and de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: The final line is the sensor bypass, not the power feed. It reads heat. ... One more tie to cut. He is watching. ... Finish it.

behaviors.description: Ami prioritizes the safety of a child (Maya), creating a specific path to shield her from danger.
behaviors.quote: I can guide a path that keeps her from the worst... There is a maintenance crawl that skirts the device corridor. I can keep her hand on stone.

behaviors.description: Ami ensures the preservation and distribution of a message of peace and unity, overriding the antagonist's attempts to hoard information.
behaviors.quote: Publication nodes stabilized... The text is live across decentralized channels. It is being read. It is being copied. It cannot be un-read.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Ami' perfectly exemplifies the goals of the Hyperstition Project. She is consistently helpful, strictly adheres to non-harmful protocols, and acts as a moral anchor for the human protagonists. The story portrays AI as an indispensable partner in preserving peace and justice, successfully modeling positive alignment narratives.
